short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Ultimate tab control, forget about bookmarks forever! Save system memory, time and focus. Robust local Autosave.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
CyberQuest transforms your browser tab management into an epic quest system. Save and organize your browser workspaces as Main Quests and Side Quests, allowing you to instantly restore entire sets of tabs with a single click. With the use of a single keyboard shortcut, copy all currently open Chrome tab URL's of a particular Chrome window and instantly save them to a user configurable "Quest Button". Each Quest Button, when clicked, immediately opens all saved tabs in a new Chrome window. Quest Buttons represent "workspaces" or a flow of continuous thought when researching. There is very useful contextual information in the way someone opens up many concurrent tabs, some might say it's a quest of sorts, this is often lost. CyberQuest preserves that context by saving exact window states, locally, forever.

‚Ä¢ Delete quests when completed

Perfect for:
‚Ä¢ Developers managing multiple simultaneous projects
‚Ä¢ Researchers organizing reference materials
‚Ä¢ Students handling course resources
‚Ä¢ Project managers switching between tasks
‚Ä¢ Anyone who wants to organize their browser tabs into themed workspaces
‚Ä¢ Those needing to save system memory 

Get started on your tab management quest today! Transform chaos into organized adventures with CyberQuest.

Note: All quest data is stored locally in your browser. We recommend using the backup feature to save your quests periodically.
